title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Enhancing E-Learning Courseware Quality Assessment and Self-Reflection Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary online learning experience and general understanding of science curricula
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five criteria for evaluating e-learning courseware quality.
Learners can evaluate a given science subject courseware and compare self-assessment scores with official assessment scores with 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze the differences between self-assessment and official assessment to propose three improvement strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
